fields.name: Title
fields.fieldText: UnitedHealth Group

fields.name: LegalText
fields.fieldText: This is a private computer system containing confidential information. Any unauthorized use or attempt to access or use this computer system or any information on it by employees or other persons may result in discipline, termination of employment, civil fines, and/or criminal penalties. This system may only be used for authorized business purposes in accordance with applicable policies. The transmission of offensive , harassing, or sexually explicit content, including text, graphics, etc., chain mail, streaming video, or gambling material may, subject to applicable local law, result in discipline , termination of employment, civil fines, and /or criminal penalties. UnitedHealth Group monitors, subject to applicable local laws, the use of its systems, including email and internet usage, so nothing you send, create, store, or receive using email or other company systems is private and may be reviewed by UnitedHealth Group.
